title: Back To Square One
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[[module CSS]]
@import url(https://scp-int.wikidot.com/component:letters-theme/code/1);
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-source= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|usericon=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/back-to-square-one/Cat.png
|usercolor=#ffffff
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=two
|username=YourMainManDave
|usericon=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:discord-chat/corvas.png
|usercolor=#0087E5
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|usericon=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/back-to-square-one/seanconnery.png
|usercolor=#ffffff
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|usericon=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/back-to-square-one/steampunk-1636156_640.png
|usercolor=#ffffff
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=five
|username=Your Average Perfect Human Being
|usericon=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/back-to-square-one/esoteric-1874403_640.png
|usercolor=#ffffff
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=six
|username=Clyde BOT
|usericon=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/back-to-square-one/clyde.png
|usercolor=#ffffff
]]

'When in doubt, listen to smooth jazz' was probably the worst piece of advice Sophie heard in a very long time. She has attempted concentrating for twenty minutes now and failed again and again. It got so bad that she figured she'd give her father's terrible advice a shot. 

//Smooth jazz. I should've never bothered//. 

//It's just little bug. I can fix this today.//

She presses the F5 button again. A new window pops up on her monitor in which a door appears. Sophie presses the W key and the camera moves towards the door. E - the door opens; the window closes; red text appears.

Sophie grabs her head. Simon looks over to her.

"Having problems fixing bugs?"

"Yes. Whenever I try entering the Inn, it just crashes."

"Sadly, I don't have that much time to help fix your bugs. The supporters from the Help Chat will probably be able to help, though." 

//That might be my last resort.//

She opens her browser, types in the address and presses Enter.

She went onto the Server she had saved at the top of her bar - [*https://scp-int.wikidot.com/letters I&I Studio].

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 2:36 PM
]]
[[span class="at_mention"]]@Veteran[[/span]]Can someone help me here? 
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=two
|username=YourMainManDave
|msg-time=Today at 2:39 PM
]]
yeah, currently got a bit of free time, just got done with my part
what is it?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 2:39 PM
]]
I've been stuck on trying to fix a bug for the past three days.
In "Knights of Terra", the one VR game we have in the works, the Inn is bugged.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=two
|username=YourMainManDave
|msg-time=Today at 2:40 PM
]]
Which Inn?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 2:40 PM
]]
The one in Three Streams.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=two
|username=YourMainManDave
|msg-time=Today at 2:40 PM
]]
I actually have the Three Streams files here. Send me your Inn file real quick.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-attch= --]
|attch-id=attch-one
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 2:42 PM
|attchname=innv031.tar.gz
|attchsize=19.42MB
|attchlink=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/back-to-square-one/inn.html
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=two
|username=YourMainManDave
|msg-time=Today at 2:42 PM
]]
Let me take a look.
...that file is corrupted.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

Sophie checks the file again. Corrupted. Maybe the upload just went wrong, so she decides to upload it yet again.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-attch= --]
|attch-id=attch-one
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 2:43 PM
|attchname=innv031.tar.gz
|attchsize=19.42MB
|attchlink=
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

But it is still corrupted. Something went wrong. She checks her files again. 

A portion of the files for Knights of Terra are corrupted. Mostly files for indoors textures, models and scripts. She hears a deep voice ring over the loudspeakers of the building.

"Ms. Lancester, to the Manager's office. This is urgent."

She stands up from her office chair and swiftly walks towards the glass door used to exit her department.

She walks up the staircase covered in a big blue carpet, passes by the support department and enters the managers department. Her manager is sitting on his way too comfortable office chair.

"Did you notice already?" Mr. Hunt spouts even before Sophie has a chance to just sit down.

"Just right now, yes. Listen, I myself don't know what happened."

Mr. Hunt sighs. "We promised to release this game by autumn next year. Now, your bloody team fucks up and half of your files are corrupted. This is bad, Ms. Lancester. Fix this."

"We could load up a backup and--"

"When was the last backup made?"

"About three weeks ago."

"Good, load that up. Now get out."

Sophie is quick to stand up. When she gets out and passes the support section, she feels a cramp in her chest. Her vision starts to get blurry and her throat tightening up. She attempts to grasp for air, only to slowly lose control over her muscles. She quickly grabs into her pocket to get her inhaler. She takes it, puts it in her mouth and presses the orange button on the top. She feels her throat loosening up and takes in a lot of air. And so, she walks back to her office chair.

She exhales and opens private messages. 

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:01 PM
]]
Hey. You there, James?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 3:03 PM
]]
Here.
You got something for me?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:04 PM
]]
Could you load up the backup for our server files for Knights of Terra from last week?
Something went wrong with our files. Half of them just went corrupt.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 3:04 PM
]]
Do we know why?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:04 PM
]]
Not yet. Could you look into that as well?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 3:05 PM
]]
On it. 
This is strange.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:12 PM
]]
What is it?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 3:12 PM
]]
The records on who did what.
The one for the last two days is corrupted.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]
@@ @@
Sophie gets nervous. She quickly takes another breath from her inhaler.
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:13 PM
]]
The backup still works though, right?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 3:13 PM
]]
Yeah, that one still works. Reverting to it now. Should be done in an hour or so.
Your team gets an early break. Lucky you.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:14 PM
]]
I wouldn't really call our situation "lucky". We have about three weeks of work to catch up on.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]


[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 3:13 PM
]]
Fair enough. Sorry for that comment.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

Sophie sighs. She opens another DM chat.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:16 PM
]]
Mr. Hunt?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 3:20 PM
]]
Have you spoken to Mr. Seybold about the backup yet?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:21 PM
]]
Yes.
Gonna take about an hour though. In the meantime, we can't do anything.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 3:21 PM
]]
Plan some story elements in the meantime.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 3:21 PM
]]
We've already planned the entire story for the game.
We're way beyond that.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 3:22 PM
]]
Plan some bonus stuff then. Achievements, Easter Eggs. Make yourself useful.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

//Make yourself useful.//

Over the course of the next two hours, Sophie's team plans a total of 5 easter eggs and 3 achievements. During this entire time, she has this nagging thought in the back of her head: //someone did this on purpose.// The files went corrupt for whatever reason, which is bound to happen from time to time, but the access history corrupted as well. What if someone corrupted the files before corrupting the history to hide their wrongdoings? Sophie brushes it off. //It's nothing. I'm just paranoid again.//

She went to sit back down at her computer. 
@@ @@
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 4:11 PM
]]
Backup is done.
I also found something more worrying.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 4:11 PM
]]
Really?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 4:12 PM
]]
Yeah. Let me just add Hunt to the chat. This is... //worrying//.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=six
|username=Clyde BOT
|msg-time=Today at 4:13 PM
]]
[[span class="at_mention"]]@LazyJim[[/span]] has added [[span class="at_mention"]]@Hunt[[/span]] to the conversation.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 4:13 PM
]]
There might be something of worry, Mr. [[span class="at_mention"]]@Hunt[[/span]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 4:17 PM
]]
Did the backup not work?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 4:18 PM
]]
Backup worked perfectly fine. 
While uploading the backup, though, I noticed a .mp3 just randomly appeared. I let it run through our antivirus and it was clean. I opened it and it was just some random noise. I brushed it off as a bug and deleted the file. Later on, I got the thought that it might be a hidden message. I recovered the file and tried editing its code. Bingo - it was actual letters. Usually, when you convert an .mp3, all you get is a bunch of bizarre symbols. This, however, was actual letters and numbers. It was still some nonsensical garbage, though. Tried decoding it with some encryption decoders. I didn't really expect to get anything - but when I ran it through Base64, one of the most basic encrypters out there, I got the message. An actual letter.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 4:22 PM
]]
What does it say?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 4:22 PM
]]
Just see for yourself

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-attch= --]
|attch-id=attch-two
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 4:23 PM
|attchname=letter.txt
|attchsize=661 B
|attchlink=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/back-to-square-one/letter.html
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

As Sophie reads the letter she clenches onto the armrests of her chair. She feels her breathing getting stronger and faster. Her eyes close themselves. //Stay calm. This-... This is fixable.//
@@ @@
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 4:25 PM
]]
I'll inform higherups this very instant. Ms. Lancester, I know that your game isn't plagarized, the only thing the two have in common is that they're set during medieval times. They're reaching.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=three
|username=LazyJim
|msg-time=Today at 4:26 PM
]]
Their game was 2D, ours is a VR Game! They have nothing in common! This is preposterous.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

Sophie gets dizzy. She stands up from her chair and opens the window. Disgusting polluted London air enters the room, and she closed the window again. 

They have three weeks of work to catch up on, so the team starts programming //fast//. 

A total of two hours pass in which Sophie programmed her literal ass off. 

It was when she returns from a small toilet break that she finds many disstressed looks on the faces of her colleagues.

As she slowely goes onto the databank of her Studio, she hears murmurs and sounds of distress coming from her colleagues. She doesn't even need to navigate down to the Knights of Terra files to see the damage. Most files were completely missing. Instead of several folders with games in them, there is a single .txt file. Sophie opens it. The PC tells her that another user from the studio was already using it, so she opens a copy.


[[image mmletter1.png]]

Within an instant, she opens her chat program and attempts contacting her manager.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 6:31 PM
]]
Mr. Hunt? Are you there?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 6:38 PM
]]
Is something the matter? I was just busy writing the incident report for the sabotage earlier.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=one
|username=SophL
|msg-time=Today at 6:38 PM
]]
Check out the database.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 6:41 PM
]]
Motherfuckers.
I actually had contact with an M&M Salesperson recently. Let me add that shithead.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=six
|username=Clyde BOT
|msg-time=Today at 6:43 PM
]]
[[span class="at_mention"]]@Hunt[[/span]] has added [[span class="at_mention"]]@Your Average Perfet Human Being[[/span]] to the conversation.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=five
|username=Your Average Perfect Human Being
|msg-time=Today at 6:47 PM
]]
Is something important the matter or do you addicts just want to waste my time?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=four
|username=Hunt
|msg-time=Today at 6:48 PM
]]
We've seen your message.
Revert the damage you've done or we'll press legal charges.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=five
|username=Your Average Perfect Human Being
|msg-time=Today at 6:51 PM
]]
If you do press legal charges, an investigation would be executed. An investigation that would then find out more about your "paratechnical department", run by your trusty aid James Seybold, responsible for making your games so addictive.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

Sophie has never heard of a paratechnical department inside of I&I, and James is responsible for the servers, not for some department.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=five
|username=Your Average Perfect Human Being
|msg-time=Today at 6:52 PM
]]
Your entire company would go down and you'd be arrested and taken into custody by you know who. There's nothing you can do.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

Sophie wants to call the M&M Salesperson out on their bluff, but before she could even type...

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=six
|username=Clyde BOT
|msg-time=Today at 6:52 PM
]]
[[span class="at_mention"]]@Hunt[[/span]] has kicked you from the conversation.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

@@ @@
